Hydras:

Alarms rang as soon as the attack began. Hydras growl and opened his 
com link  to al Preds "To all Preds, we're under attack take your 
positions and kill all intruders "

Hydras himself ran towards the exit, as Perceptor and BlackStorm when 
they received the message.

The auto guns started to fire against Tripedocus 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Darkangel : :
> 
> Darkangel: Yes sir! Finally we can do this!
> 
> Darkangel leaps into the air, transforming to bot mode. He starts 
to fire down on the Pred base.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Remember them?
> 
> They had waited a long time. Too long. But now was the time.
> 
> Tyrael: Tripredacus, we will strike now! Deathsteel has seemingly 
gone
> silent, and we must strike while the Predacons grow complacent.
> Kaiser, aim for any defenses and blow them up ASAP. Darkangel,
> Dreadplague, fly up and distract enemy ground forces. Dread, ground
> the enemy air forces. Dragoon, you're with me. Hydras must die 
today!
> 
> He liberated his light, making the surrounding bayou as luminescent 
as
> if a giant light bulb had been suddenly turned on.  He moved 
quickly,
> hovering over the murky waters in order to surprise his enemies the
> most. The major was determined to win this time, and his forces were
> strong.
>
